name: Monkey Mania (Canceled)
blurb: The corporate world is under attack! Help the Monkey Master defend the Golden Banana HQ in this pulsating action game.

rewards.reward: Intern (Approx. $1.50): Welcome to the corporate world. As a first step in your road to power, you will receive a tasty thank you email for your contribution, stamped personally by the Monkey Master. Your name will also be listed in the credits of the game upon release.

Entry Level (Approx. $5): It didn't take much to get promoted to entry level, so now your days in the copy room are almost over. Thanks to your generous offer, you will receive the Monkey Mania screensaver package containing 4 different 1024x768 pixel screensavers, the Monkey Mania mp3 Ringtone for your mobile device, along with all the Intern rewards.

Manager's Assistant (Approx. $11): The corporate world begins to reward your efforts. Here you are, freshly promoted to the position of Manager's Assistant.  With this purchase you will receive a High-Res Monkey Mania digital poster, along with all previous rewards.

Monkey Project Manager (Approx. $16): You will receive a pack of 3 Monkey Mania postcards and an exclusive copy of the unreleased first chapter from the upcoming eBook, "The Monkey Master's Guide to Succeeding in the Corporate World", as well as all rewards from the lower value packages.

Monkey Manager (Approx. $27): Life gets better the further up the corporate ladder you go. You will receive a Monkey Mania T-Shirt (Adult or Children's) in the size of your choice plus all rewards from the lower value packages.

International Monkey Manager (Approx. $47): As International Monkey Manager you will receive an A1 size Monkey Mania poster and the first 2 chapters from the upcoming eBook, The Monkey Master's Guide to succeeding in the Corporate World. Needless to say, all rewards from the lower value packages will be included.

Board Member (Approx. $102): Your glory days are on the horizon. Now that you've been certified as a Member of the Board, you will receive a Monkey Mania iPhone case for either an iPhone 4 or iPhone 5 model. In addition you will also get a Monkey Mania Mouse Pad. You're sitting on the board now, so you can be damn sure you'll get all the rewards from the lower value packages as well!

Board President (Approx. $274): Congratulations. It seems that the corporate world is now your playground. You will receive a signed copy of the Monkey Mania Art book and Production Log, along with the first 3 chapters of "The Monkey Master's Guide to Succeeding in the Corporate World", plus all previous rewards.

Monkey Mogul (Approx. $625): After outgunning the competition, you got to the top of the pyramid... well almost. With high pledges come high responsibilities. Collaborate with us to pick and design an outfit for one of the characters of your choosing, which will be named in the game after you. You will also be allocated as one of the testers of the Beta version of the game and be given the opportunity to provide your feedback and opinions, as well as all previous rewards.

Monkey Master (Approx. $937): You mastered the corporate world and you got all the way up here, to the Olympus of the Executive Monkeys. You will be provided with a copy of the full game 2 weeks before it's official release date so you can start collecting gold coins and get a head start on your friends. You can also collaborate with us to design a scenario of your choosing. Includes all previous awards as well.

Executive Game Producer (Approx. $1562): Your corner office has more plants than the jungle. As Executive Game Producer you will have your name appear on the opening screen as one of the executive producers along with an animated caricature of yourself in the same style as one of the new images you've just seen. In addition, get taken out for the day in either London (UK) or Wisconsin (USA) by either Dimi or Alistair (Flight and Accommodation arrangements will need to be handled by you, but the day out is on us). All the items from the previous rewards will also end up in your hands.
